content: --धर, --धार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} carrying a staff, staffbearer. {2} punishing, chastising; <ls>U. 2. 10.</ls> {3} exercising judicial authority. (--रः {1} a king; श्रमनुदं मनुदंडधरान्वयं <ls>R. 9. 3.</ls> {2} <ab>N.</ab> of Yama. {3} a judge, supreme magistrate. {4} a mendicant carrying a staff. {5} a potter.
